headline: DoorDash is expanding into restaurant reservations and robot deliveries
summary: DoorDash is expanding its offerings, adding restaurant reservations and robot deliveries in some U.S. markets.  DoorDash's total orders jumped 20% to 761 million in the second quarter of this year.  DoorDash's robots will bring new challenges to the company as it takes on the responsibility for storing and maintaining the devices.

headline: Why Instacart (CART) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of online grocery delivery platform Instacart (NASDAQ:CART) fell 8.7% in the afternoon session after reports revealed that rival DoorDash Inc. and supermarket giant Kroger Co. are expanding their partnership for grocery delivery starting next month, intensifying competition.

headline: Movie tariffs, Beyond Meat, Kroger & DoorDash: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including media stocks Netflix (NFLX), Disney (DIS), and Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) as President Trump floats the idea of 100% tariffs on movies made outside of the US; Beyond Meat (BYND) stock sinking on its new debt proposal; and Kroger (KR) and DoorDash (DASH) expanding their new partnership. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: FedEx, UPS peak season surcharges could drive shippers to competitors
summary: Parcel carriers like FedEx and UPS are implementing peak season surcharges to recover costs when there isn’t a spike in volume to gear up for, leaving frustrated customers looking for alternative providers. The post FedEx, UPS peak season surcharges could drive shippers to competitors appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: DoorDash and Kroger are expanding their grocery delivery partnership
summary: Starting Oct. 1, DoorDash will offer delivery from Kroger’s 2,700 U.S. stores, both companies said Monday.  San Francisco-based DoorDash, which is the largest U.S. delivery provider, launched grocery delivery in 2020 with a handful of partners, including Fresh Thyme and Meijer.  DoorDash first partnered with Kroger in 2022, when it started delivering flowers, sushi and prepared meals from a limited number of stores.

raw.headline: DoorDash and Kroger are expanding their grocery delivery partnership

DoorDash first partnered with Kroger in 2022, when it started delivering flowers, sushi and prepared meals from a limited number of stores.

headline: Kroger and DoorDash to Bring Fast, Convenient Grocery Delivery to Millions Nationwide
summary: DoorDash (NASDAQ: DASH), a global leader in local commerce, and The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), America's grocer, announced an expansion of their relationship to bring Kroger's full grocery assortment, including fresh food, exclusive Our Brands products, and affordable everyday essentials to customers. Through the expanded relationship, Kroger will make shopping easier for customers, leverage the company's growing store network in new ways, and attract new households and incremental shopping occasion
